attributes.action: Admit that he is not interested in the views of the electorate and resign immediately.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: By going ahead and ratifying the Lisbon Treaty the Prime Minister has showed total disregard for the the electorate and for our country. What is worse, he makes a mockery of the young men and women in our armed forces who are dying for this country, by saying they give their lives for freedom, when he is determined to give that freedom away.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
